basicUsage.title: Basic Usage
basicUsage.description: Toasts can be created using the .toast class. They can include an icon, header, body, and close button.

styleProperties.title: Style Properties
styleProperties.description: Toasts provide various styles by combining border and long properties:
styleProperties.borderTrue: border=true (.border): 1px full outline only (no accent border)
styleProperties.longFalseDefault: long=false (default): Vertical layout, 4px accent border on top when border=false
styleProperties.longTrue: long=true (.long): Horizontal layout, 4px accent border on left when border=false
styleProperties.borderFalseDescription: The default style displays a 4px thick accent border on top.
styleProperties.borderTrueDescription: Adding the .border class displays only a 1px full outline (no accent border).

longStyle.title: Long Style
longStyle.description: Adding the .long class changes to horizontal layout, and the border position changes from top to left. Useful when displaying toasts in narrow spaces.
longStyle.longTrueBorderFalseDescription: Displays a 4px thick accent border on the left.
longStyle.longTrueBorderTrueDescription: Displays only a 1px full outline (no accent border).
longStyle.commentLongTrueBorderFalse: long=true, border=false (4px accent border on left)
